attributes.action: Teach mental health awareness and disability awareness In schools.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to teach mental health awareness because I feel alot of people grow up not understanding it and for some not understanding themselves.
attributes.background: I want the government to make schools teach mental health awareness and disability awareness.  And also to teach about how to look after their mental wellbeing.

rejection.details:
It’s is compulsory for all schools to teach pupils about mental health and wellbeing as part of health and relationships education.

You may wish to start a new petition calling for the Government to review the current curriculum in relation to mental health.
